So two nights ago, i went to the beach with my friends nelson, claude and jon, and we sat at the beach and watched the mooon set over the pacific ocean. it was really fucking awesome. it really opened my eyes to the fucking brilliance of the solar system....and airtraffic highways.

EMANUEL SUCKS!

Enjoy teh weather now, and feel free to crush your hands against the low clouds.

alright you ladies and gentlemen how the fuck are you!?

So "with herbi" is my new band.we are currently working on our first LP. hahaha. WE have the first song almost completely recorded. its pretty nifty. the band consists of myself, matt (a 22 year old real estate agent), jon ( a 21 year old petroleum transfer technition), and derek (a 17 year old trapped in a 30 year olds body). the music is good. The words are better.


So i found the greatest thing in the world...sleeping on the couch. i sleep on the couch in the room of my hosue no one is ever in. its great, im completely left alone, and no one knows where i am.

not much is really new with me. its 4-20 and i am not smoking pot. i cant...which is a good thing.

i am going to san francisco next week with jon to go see NIN. ALSO i have the new nin album, thanks to miss hannah. its pretty good. songs 1 and 6-13 are good. songs 2-5 are just......

Fuck red lights.

I am very excited about the music being made. its really coming together tighter then anything ive ever done before. 



"Our relationship has been proven to only be conversational/no detachments of pride for a feeling of attachment for the soul for whom my thoughts fly about in repetive toungue speaking your feelings and bleeding your touch through acts given to stay departed/Rage and forever ending love given to the mind raked away by the echoes sounding to life/Chose to give in when there is nothing left to give in/speak the rose inside your head and maybe we wont feel so dead/To kill the sight the feeling and fight ive framed in my imagination/to give and care for an internal rest of undeniable emotional space/Hovering above the absence of clouds ive fallen to soon/fallen to build yourself around what you hope will be so new, what you hope will be you/ where were we when we heard the voice inside my head saying give in to your creature and give in to your time for here i will be waiting this time/this hope so lost as sorry as i came i leave knowing the same, waiting at will in water high waves. this feeling we crave has only been swayed/float away in you i start to hope we will be so new, a hope i might see. A dream made real for me when i started to floataway/ i see only you/i feel only you/i lose only you/i am only you."

what do you know? 


ladies and gentlemen maybe ill post more, maybe i wont. we will see if it matters.

i love you all with a passion and a big heart!

in a world full of ugliness

fragile
she doesn't see her beauty
she tries to get away

it's just that nothing seems worth saving

hoping someone can see

we'll find the perfect place to go where we can run and hide

...and picking...

it's something I have to do

before everyhting else
I was like you

Slay the things that trouble you...

it rained yesterday, it should rain today, so i can go dancing in the rain.

'Little Fly, 
Thy summer's play 
My thoughtless hand 
Has brushed away. 

Am not I 
A fly like thee? 
Or art not thou 
A man like me? 

For I dance 
And drink, and sing, 
Till some blind hand 
Shall brush my wing. 

If thought is life 
And strength and breath 
And the want 
Of thought is death; 

Then am I 
A happy fly, 
If I live, 
Or if I die.'

-William Blake

its strange how we all smile at eachothers evil, thinking it to be a joke. tomorow should be my last day ever attending torrey pines high school. i shall walk away, a angry sad man. but alas thats how i should feel. last night corey and i talked and are moving into a new light. we quit everything. our experiences with toxix illegal things is no more. threw away everything. Corey plans on quitting his job at the gas station, and hopes to get a job at the local library. where he could submerge himself deep in books, and continue to expand on his writing, which i must say, has gotten quite impressive. i myself, plan on leaving torrey pines, and starting a new, with my music, my outlook with everything. with my head high and a heart full, and eyes open i shall do my own thing. i am recording tonight to try and finish  a song i am writing, i started writing this morning at one a.m. and it will hopefully be played at b.o.b. assuming we play. 




"...its all art"


"someday we will look back at our painting, and wish we rolled in the paint a little more, and held nothing back."

i am hopefully palying at this coming battle of hte bands in december. it would be my band 'murmur' plus derek. derek and myself- guitar. brian and gus- bass. zack- drums. first day we would paly two songs, one of which id completely write, and the otehr that derek would write. sooo, you should be soo lucky as to hear me play my sweeet guitar. are you excited yet?

my great grandma is hte hospital, so, my thoughts go to her. i hear i brought a smile to her face with teh messege i gave my mom to relay to her. (my mom is up in irvine at the hospital with her). hope all goes well with that.

love you all. enjoy yourself.

hey you...come keep me company. =)

im back, im listening to music, and im wearing long pants.

im going to go surprise corey at work later this evening.

colorado was freaking awesome, i already miss it. we might be buyin a house out there, whether to move or have a second home i do not know. it would be in my same old neighborhood, and like two streets from my old house. itd be awesome to have a second home out there, road trips! road TRips!  it was nice to see everyone again, the people there freakin rule.    we went to the air force SDSU game in colorado springs, stayed the whole game, through 17 degree weather and continual snow! the aztecs won 37-31. over all the trip, was...too short.


missed you.


i get to pick up a paycheck tomorow =)

I am off to colorado tomorrow. it is soo freaking beautiful. i have such vivid memories of there, and it shall indeed be breath taking  just to witness it all over again. i shall take a great number of pictures.

Enjoy your four day weekend, all you crazy cats.

im wearing an "i voted" sticker cause i helped set up the nearest poll to my house, which happened to be at the solana beach community center, where there is this bench at the end of this cliff, that is like directly above the ocean. sooo nifty.


I wrote some poetry today 

"i hate kerry like i hate mayonaise"






for, as evil has always been disguised
so will our love
so will our thought of mind
for every good holds its own darkness.

sunee called me tonight, and we talked for about 45 minutes. we talk lots, but tonight she was driving home from her BOYFRIENDS house while we were talking. what is she doing to me? i want more, i dont know.

what should i do about this?

last night at ten, corey and i went on a walk to the donut shop down the street to grab a a donut and score some milk. WE were goofing around and, we got a hilarious messege from Rory saying "Dude zombies. 805 is closed due to a police investigation. find weapons."  we did not grab any weapons and join the fight against zombies...sadly. theeeeeen. a homeless man (urban outdoors man) came in to buy coffee with the 82 cents he had (with help from the tip jar), soo i got out my wallet and gave him all the cash i had left in there. He graciously accepted the money with a gigantic smile and left with his coffee to sit outside. corey and i then left and walked by him as he walked back in to get more coffee, he waved and gave me a great big smile that made me happy...

...then walking back, the crazyness ensued. i started to get really really sick. everything in my body was hurting, and i was getting very lightheaded. we had to stop walking a few times cause i could not really move, i was almost throwing up, but never did. sooo needless to say i was freaked out, and corey was too. we finally made it home, and we popped in a movie and watched. my body was twitching in a wierd way, mainly my feet, and i was still hurting. before the movie started i was out...

...i woke up the next morning to the buzz of my phone, it was gus! it was the wierdest feeling to be awake. i was so unbelievably happy. i was so fucking scared the previous night. but woah, god bless vitamin b complex. and from talking to corey, he said the night was fucking scary too, cause the walk home. we both didn't know what was happening. my right arm has hurt all day, but its not my left arm, so thats good.

soo What better to do on the day you wake up alive, then drive up to la, to go to a poetry book signing of your idol. so, corey and i drove up to l.a. to go to a billy corgan book signing. we were relatively close to the front of this massive line of crazy people. the signing was at the MASSIVE virgin records mega store. while up in la, we saw a movie, cause we had my mom hold our place in line. cause we had my mom there (she wouldn't let me go alone since it was raining, but mainly cause she wanted to meet billy corgan). the movie we saw was "The Machinist" a totally fucked up movie, that makes no sense till the end. Christian bale was the main character. it was an entertaining movie.   but to the point, i got to shake billy corgans hand!!! he has the fucking coolest hands ever. and he signed my boook. and (name withheld currently) was there!! and it was awesome, and my momyy got like 3 pictures. and it was awesome. And i bought a book and had it signed for sunee, since she was going to go with us, but ended up being unable to go, unfortunately.

and the red sox won the world series. 


and thankyou to all who called or messeged me inquiring about my health. i appreciate and love all of you. and i miss you all to death already, cause i have a fresh view of everything now it would seeeem.

lots as been going on lately, a lot is still going on. i feel like someone is waiting in line behind me and i need to get out of there way.... 

...when really there is no one there. 

sooo much i want to explain to myself.

---------------
i want to have you the way you've dreamt
i want to hold you in a way time stops
i want to dream the way i once slept
i want to feel in many ways
i will to be free of my wants
they bring nothing
---------------



Help me to love you or something like it.

I am sooo tired, and having someone follow me around and making themselves cry aint helping. ahhh. 
soooo... tomorow i shall make a choice as to avoid by:

1. Acting drunk/stoned/blitzed or anything needed.
2. Stage a fight and slip away in the mess.

IMMM SOOO TIRED. 



  a little poetry for you...


A single bulb lights this room
It's dark in here all the time
If the cieling had only captured my dreams and nightmares alike,
     what stories it could show.
She is here, the one
The one i love, desire, devise, rescue, all to my hearts own sorrow
Im lost in this room, but this is the place the valentines are written
The site of my greatest thought and saddest song
There are no birds to fly over, no islands to reach
No sun to catch me crying
This is the gift of oblivion and opaque dance

Well shit, what an exciting week. from ditching to dropping classes, from getting weapons pulled on you to running from crazed stalkers, from loosing mass amount of blood in a glass accident to pondering life at the beach late at night, i would say that weeek should never happen AGAIN!! ahh yeah.

I have a sort of stalker, and its crazy, its nuts, i cannot handle the emotional stress of it. i was asked out be her today in a joking manner as to feel me out i guess. she started crying while talking to me today. and she runs after me!! if you see me with her, i ask you to do this: Grab my arm, pull my arm and drag me away. Dont look back... I should just find a girlfriend, that would have to scare her away. crazy.

Well i got a paycheck today. and shall i say it was a solid paycheck for many hundreds of dollars, the great thing is, just for the last two weeks of working. ahhh, its nice.

Mr. Eldred came into my gov. class today and was looking for the "alliance" then he quickly realized this was not where the "allience" was and left. School conspiracy? Is the schools underground bunker back in fulll service? Are they really pirates? well, just know, the "alliance" is gathering, WATCH YOUR BACKS.

the Nine Inch Nails are amazing! 

Gus and i staged a sweeet little skirmish today. Desks were thrown and knocked over, people were slammed against walls, and innocent women and children were screaming "My god, what have we done!"


Enjoy yourself

so today was really good,  ditched 6th period with hannah and andrew, very enlightening. there is so much beauty in nature, its the most visually stunning thing there is, and its always changing. Hannah and andrew are fun people. i still laugh at the thought of andrew running.

The day was perfect
And well then someone ruined my day!!!! i bite my thumb at you!! have at you, bastard...

Well, work is still going well, besides the fact that i work too fucking much. But it is cool to build and work on custom frame work. The other day thomas and i framed, this map of al fallujah for this american soldier that just got back from iraq, the map was all charred up and had a few holes in it. we also framed with that the bullet and the piece of kevlar that saved his life. this bullet passsed through the map he was holding and hit him in the side. It was really cool to frame all of that and be part of building that. Thomas's brother is over in iraq right where the map that we were framing was of. so my heart goes out to him and everyone over there with him.

Reasons why my hands rule: I know ASL, I play guitar, I can juggle very well, and i am a certified custom framer, and...

JULIO is home, and there is nothing greater then that. He is currently conquering the westward world, or just stupid people.

My new song is fucking awesome, like its really really good, much time will be spent on lyrics and some sort of vocal arrangement.

its all so beautiful!

i want to hold you.

i want to hold you.

i want to hold you.

I  want you to hold..



Enjoy yourselves.

well coool. I droped my third period today, and moved my fifth period to third period, and added work experience...what this means is....Freee fifth period!! very cool. i got home today at one and slept until 425, and got to work at 434. My work wants me to be the full time lead Framer, which would mean insane responsibility and much more money then i make now. unfortuanately i have to be 18, but im already certified, and working as more of an 'apprentice' to the framer now. but when i turn 18, since ill still be in this area, hells yeah. the current framer thomas, and i had a really good talk yesterday for about an hour on various things. (i was not on duty) he gave me a solid compliment, very real. haha. things are working well, although i sliced the top of my hand open today on a piece of specialty glass. i put my blood and sweat into that job.

I bought the 'tao Teh Ching' yesterday. very intriguing read. im greatly enjoying it.

I finished the music to a really good song yesterday. i drove to corey's to play it for him, he liked it alot, and we are going to start recording it. really going to spedn a lot of time recording it, cause i have sort of a vision for this song, and all the insturments and parts i want to go with. i am very pleased with the direction. I started writing lyrics to the music today, my vocals worked well in some areas, but will definately need much much work on a whole. but, im moving in the right direction.

Schedule for work this week. I got tuesday-thursday off for personal reasons.
Saturday: 930-230 or later if i please.
Sunday: 1-6
Monday: 430-930
Friday: 430-930
Saturday: 930-600

thank you. ;)

hello all. i am currently stressed with a big decision. i am going to the california high school proficiency test, so if i pass i get my high school diploma and then i drop out of school, and begin my trek through college. I am going to take the test no matter what, and i can drop out of high school right away, at the semester or technically i could keep going through the year as normally planned. I am wasting my time in high school though, its such shit, and i am going to get bad grades cause i really see no point in doing any of that useless shit. the only bummer is id be away from the social aspect of school, all of you whom i believe to be my friends. i really do not know, i am rather torn. i want some feedback from you, the viewer. should i stay...give me reasons to stay. i think itd be good to drop out and move on.

ditched third period today so i could hang with gus. 

went to dinner with my parents today so we could talk. we talked about my status, and what i am going to do with myself, and what i am looking to do now. it was good, and  im glad we did that. im not exactly sure what i am going to do about high school though. im looking into some tests and yeah yeah yea... 

The NHL is on strike!!!! fucking lame.

its sort of wierd to be confronted with something so serious going on with someone you just met. this guy was talking about his 'sweetie', the love of his life, who sadly just lost her life to cancer; his wife. man, love is a strong thing. the way he talked about her and the cancer, blew me away. he loved that women, i know that much.

i got to hang out with some splendid people tonight. it had been far to long. those people being james hess, leon, and andrew naughton. the three of us hung in the parking lot of red robin before then proceeding to eat at red robin. i noticed some things at dinner, and well it was nice. they are good people. i miss people like them.



its not just a joke, its a religion.

HELL YES. i just passed both certification tests at work.

i got a 92 percent on the design certification test, and a 86 percent on the framing certification test. now i am a certified design and framing expert. cause of that i get a slight raise for passing each of those tests. i was really excited. i am also currently number two in custom sales average, only behind the stores framer. i'm 2 out of 7.

my new band has really grown together nicely, we all get along, and we all know our music. so far this band gets along better then any of my other past bands. we are jamming tomorrow, i really like the sound and potential. just fun to play. i like being the only guitarist! that'll probably change though, we might add another. you should become a groupieeeee....slightly communist groupies...hahahaha.

oh yeah, my dad hit my car yesterday, he backed into it. ..lots of crap...

got to therapeutically get some crap out today talking to my manager at work. lots of crap needed to be shared. i enjoyed his reaction.it was good. he is a funny funny man. in fact everyone i work with is enjoyable. and strangely enough one person at work has figured me out. sort of funny. hahaha.

happy birthday to my sister! she turns 20 today, and is currently in her new apartment in italy. 


...and so i said: "THAT WAS MY FOOT!" =)

note to the reader: there is a prostitution ring set up next to the san deguito academy. next to my old elementary school.

Julio have a wonderful time in spain and france. I enjoyed working with you emmensely. You will be missed. cant wait to hang again!

just Remember: "They are all sluts!"
